notes: Successive procs on the same target do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.
The proc chances of Maim from multiple Sange and Sange derived items work fully independently from each other.
The proccing attack first applies the debuff, then its own damage.
Does not work against wards and buildings. Works against allied units.
abilities.description: Each attack has a 20% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by 20% and attack speed by 60 when used by a melee hero. Effect lasts 3 seconds.
itemBehaviour:
(Spell_immunity_block_symbol)^Does not pierce spell immunity
Slow persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.

name: Penta-Edged Sword
description: The final, twisted work of a severely pious blacksmith, completed immediately before the taking of his own life.
